text: OMF International (or Overseas Missionary Fellowship and China Inland Mission before 1964) is an inter-denominational Protestant Christian missionary society. It was started by English missionary Hudson Taylor on 25 June, 1865. == Other websites == * OMF International (formerly China Inland Mission and Overseas Missionary Fellowship) * Wheaton College Billy Graham Center Archives of the China Inland Mission Category:Christian organizations
title: OMF International
